```{r install_packages}
library(pdftools)
library(tidyverse)
library(tidytext)
```

## Reading in the data
```{r read_data}
lawson_full_text <- pdftools::pdf_text(pdf = "data/Lawson_Edwin_10131972.pdf")
```

```{r string-data}
# convert text to string
lawson_full_text <- toString(lawson_full_text)
lawson_full_text
# convert text to character lines
lawson <- read_lines(lawson_full_text)

lawson <- tibble(lawson)
```
